item.description:
AND THE WINNER IS...

You will have to scroll down to see who they are but before you do some interesting facts about the raffle:

  • There were 175 different people who qualified for the raffle because they participated in at least one event between September 1, 2010 and June 30, 2011.
  • These people earned a combined 480 "Tickets" - one for each regular event and five for each trail work event.
  • Ashley Carneal and John (LAG) each earned 19 - for regular events and trail work events.
  • Emily Singer and Karine participated in the most events - 16.

Thanks to everyone for making the group such a success.

Michael & Monica

=====

Columbia Sportswear has been gracious enough to sponsor our group so that we can keep membership free and continue to offer a wide range of fun and exciting random adventures. Part of this sponsorship includes various apparel items that I want to pass along to you guys.

Unfortunately they did not give me enough stuff to give everyone in the group something so I have decided to give two lucky people some free stuff. While I could just randomly pick two names from our roster of members I want to reward those of you who have made our group great by participating in our events.

To get your name on the list of potential winners all you have to do is participate in at least one event between now and June 15, 2011. The more you participate the more chances you get. It’s that simple. But since I also want to include those of you who have been participating all along I am also going to give chances for each event that you have participated in since September 1, 2010.

When it comes time to draw the names the first name I pick gets the Men's Tull Creek Jacket and the second name gets to pick either the men’s or women’s Men’s or Women’s Shield Long Sleeve Top.

So, here’s more about the appearal…

=====

Men's Tull Creek Jacket WINNER: EMILY SINGER

 


Color: Compass Blue

Retail Price: $240.00

Rainstorms are a lovely time to be in the forest; the colors are richer, and the smells more intense. This highly technical Omni-Dry jacket creates a completely waterproof, ultrabreathable barrier against the elements, so all you have to worry about is keeping the dog away from skunks and porcupines.

Excellent for active outdoors enthusiast, the Tull Creek is fully seam sealed and features an extremely air-permeable, waterproof 2-layer fabric that diffuses excess heat and vapors while still stopping outside moisture from coming in. It has a rich texture and sleek, minimalist design that’s equally at home on street or trail. The attached storm hood features a bonded brim to keep the rain off your face and elasticized cord adjustment that allows your hood to follow your head so that it never impedes your vision. Hand pockets and a security pocket over the heart are clean and discrete thanks to Invizzip.

FEATURES:

  • Fabric: 100% polyester 2L 50 denier twill
  • Omni-Dry ultra-breathable waterproof and fully taped seams
  • Attached adjustable storm hood
  • Vented underarm zips
  • Pockets feature Invizzip
  • Center back length: 30.5”

=====

Men’s Bug Shield Long Sleeve Crew WINNER: MIKE


 

Color: Burst

Retail Price: $70.00

Ever wish you could raise a force field against nature's pesky little bugs and buzzers? Now you can. The Bug Shield long sleeve is a virtual trifecta of protective awesomeness.

New Insect Blocker technology keeps six-legged pests at bay, Omni-Shade offers UPF 30 sun protection, and Omni-Wick advanced evaporation technology keeps you cool, dry, and collected - leaving you free to focus on the adventure at hand. We package all this protection in a streamlined, classic long sleeve crew that works as well under vests and shells as it does on its own.

FEATURES:

  • Fabric: 100% polyester
  • Insect Blocker
  • Omni-Shade UPF 30 sun protection
  • Omni-Wick advanced evaporation
  • Antimicrobial

=====

Women’s Bug Shield Long Sleeve Top   WINNER: CARRIE


 

Color Compass Blue

Retail Price: $60.00

Ever wish you could raise a force field against nature's pesky little bugs and buzzers? Now you can. The Bug Shield long sleeve is a virtual trifecta of protective awesomeness.

New Insect Blocker technology keeps six-legged pests at bay and Omni-Shade offers UPF 50 sun protection, leaving you free to focus on the adventure at hand. We package all this perfect protection in a super comfortable flex-fit package that feels great and looks sleek. With simple styling and a broad range of colors, you'll be looking sharp as you enjoy your reign as queen of the camping kingdom.

FEATURES:

  • Fabric: 100% polyester Bug Shield Texture Tech double knit
  • Insect Blocker
  • Omni-Shade UPF 50 sun protection
  • Flex fit
item.why: You should participate because I am giving away free stuff!
item.name: Member Appreciation Raffle
